name: @tsdotnet/observable-timer
description: An observable timer class that publishes to its subscribers on every tick or specified interval.
author: electricessence

scripts.build:dist: rimraf dist/* && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.d.ts dist
scripts.build: pnpm i && pnpm run build:dist && pnpm run build:dist-esm
scripts.bump: npm run-script precommit && npm version patch
scripts.precommit: pnpm i && run-p lint test && run-p build:* && npm run-script validate && git status -s
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run-script build && run-p validate test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run-script docs && git add -A && git commit -m "Updated docs." docs && git push
